ground_truth.thought: 分析这些数据，找出风险较大的事件
ground_truth.name: FinancialDataAPI.analyze_risk_events

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialDataAPI.get_risk_events', 'description': 'Get the major risk events in a specific currency market over a specified period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'currency', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the currency code (e.g., CNY for Chinese Yuan).'}, {'name': 'period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the time period (e.g., 1 year).'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'events', 'description': 'a list of risk events, each event is a dict with event_name, event_date, and impact_level.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我是一名金融分析师，正在研究人民币市场的风险。首先，我需要获取过去一年人民币市场的主要风险事件数据，包括汇率波动、利率变化和政策调整。然后，我需要分析这些数据，找出风险较大的事件。接着，我需要获取这些事件的详细信息，包括影响范围和持续时间。最后，基于这些分析，我需要提供风险管理的建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取过去一年人民币市场的主要风险事件数据
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'currency'的值是什么?
当前工具的参数'period'的值是什么?

{'events': [{'event_name': '汇率波动', 'event_date': '2022-05-15', 'impact_level': 'high'}, {'event_name': '利率变化', 'event_date': '2022-08-20', 'impact_level': 'medium'}, {'event_name': '政策调整', 'event_date': '2022-11-10', 'impact_level': 'high'}]}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'events': [{'event_name': '汇率波动', 'event_date': '2022-05-15', 'impact_level': 'high'}, {'event_name': '利率变化', 'event_date': '2022-08-20', 'impact_level': 'medium'}, {'event_name': '政策调整', 'event_date': '2022-11-10', 'impact_level': 'high'}]}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?

prediction: 当前这一步的目标是分析获取到的风险事件数据，找出风险较大的事件。
